# registers
# 0: dividend
# 1: divisor
# 2: 100000..000 (mask)
# 3: 1
# 4: temp value
# 6: quotient
# 7: remainder

# logic for divider
SUB Q, Q, Q
ADD D1, Q, R
WHILE:
    SUB R, D2, R
    AND R, mask, TMP
    BNZ TMP, DONE
    ADD 1, Q, Q
    BNZ 1 WHILE
DONE:
    WHILE2:
        AND R, mask, TMP
        XOR TMP, mask, TMP
        BNZ TMP, DONE2
        ADD R, D2, R
        BNZ 1 WHILE2
DONE2:

# binary for divider
0010 1 110 110 110
0000 1 000 110 111
0010 1 111 001 111
1000 1 111 010 100
1010 0 100 000111
0000 1 110 011 110
1010 0 011 000010
1000 1 111 010 100
0011 1 100 010 100
1010 0 100 001100
0000 1 111 001 111
1010 0 011 000111
1111 0 000 000 000

00101110110110
00001000110111
00101111001111
10001111010100
10100100000111
00001110011110
10100011000010
10001111010100
00111100010100
10100100001100
00001111001111
10100011000111
11110000000000
